hints.content:
We start at $5{:}11$ when Bernardo starts playing his trumpet.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 5:00 to 5:45 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 5:11. !

hints.content: Each tick mark on the number line represents $1$ minute.

So, we need to move **right** on the number line $33$ minutes.

[[☃ image 1]]

$\begin{align}
{5{:}11} +{} &\greenD{4}\text{ minutes} = 5{:}15\\\\
5{:}15 +{} & \purpleD{25}\text{ minutes} = 5{:}40 \\\\
5{:}40 +{}&\goldE{4}\text{ minutes} = \goldE{5{:}44}\\\\
\end{align}$

options.alt: A number line labeled 5:00 to 5:45 with tick marks every 1 unit. A series of three arrows are shown moving left to right from the 5:11 tick mark to the 5:44 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 5:11 tick mark and ends at the 5:15 tick mark and is labeled plus 4. The second arrow starts at the 5:15 tick mark and ends at the 5:40 tick mark and is labeled plus 25. The third arrow starts at the 5:40 tick mark and ends at the 5:44 tick mark and is labeled plus 4. !

hints.content:
Bernardo finishes playing his trumpet at $5{:}44\text{ p.m.}$

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 5:00 to 5:45 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 5:44. !

question.content:
Bernardo starts playing his trumpet at $5{:}11\text{ p.m.}$ He finishes $33$ minutes later. 

**Which number line below graphs when Bernardo finishes playing his trumpet?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A number line labeled 5:00 to 5:45 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 5:44.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e29f289dbf95100888b64c6b80604eff8a647831)
![A number line labeled 5:00 to 5:45 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 5:11.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e95b9c6d9541e30c2cb2525c72c6a93bcea2a58c)
![A number line labeled 5:00 to 5:45 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 5:38.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/cc34af284542dc50ff09146cdb63986f76917eff)
